mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favor (favor_id, good_id, user_id) VALUES (#{favorId}, #{goodId}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.favor_id, f.good_id, f.user_id, g.good_id AS "good.goodId", g.name AS "good.name", g.price AS "good.price" FROM favor f INNER JOIN good g ON f.good_id = g.good_id INNER JOIN user u ON f.user_id = u.user_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} order by f.create_time DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM favor WHERE user_id = #{userId}
